dimensions: plate (sheet trimmed to plate): 23.2 × 29.2 cm (9 1/8 × 11 1/2 in.)
inscribed:
Titled in plate, lower center: CHARITAS

Printed in plate, lower center left and right: H. cock excude. / BRVEGEL. 1559

Two lines of Latin printed below plate
